thread.title: WATCH: Sunrise hosts label Lady Elliot 'poop island'
thread.title_full: WATCH: Sunrise hosts label Lady Elliot 'poop island'

title: WATCH: Sunrise hosts label Lady Elliot 'poop island'
text:
"It's not a continential or rock island, it's made by all the animals and the creatures that have created this magnificent Great Barrier Reef, this world heritage listed park..." he said. 
Holding some of the ground, Mr Gash explained what the island was made up of. 
"What you see is the excreta, or the waste product of the coral polyp, it basically is poop." 
Mr Gash then spoke about how bird poo also adds to the stack. 
When the show crossed back to the studio, the hosts giggled about "poop island", with Natalie suggesting the fact could be used in the marketing. Reader poll What did you think of the segment? Calling the island 'poop island' was too negative It was a bit of a laugh, no harm there Any publicity is good publicity
